input.rewritten_query: 列出需要重点关注的学生，并说明具体理由

output.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT DISTINCT student.student_no, student.real_name, score.score_value, attendance.status FROM student JOIN score ON student.id = score.student_id AND score.is_deleted = 0 JOIN attendance ON student.id = attendance.student_id AND attendance.is_deleted = 0 WHERE score.score_value < 60 AND attendance.status = '缺勤' AND student.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.student_no, base.real_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN base.score_value < 60 THEN '成绩不及格' WHEN base.status = '缺勤' THEN '缺勤' END SEPARATOR '；') AS reason FROM base GROUP BY base.student_no, base.real_name ORDER BY base.student_no
